introduction: Welcome to the world of rain, summer storms, and typhoons! Up in the clouds, four little rains - Thundery, Dropetty, Roy, and Tormenta - are starting school. They dream of going down to Earth to meet real people and rabbits. But until that day arrives, the four friends must learn how to pour, create puddles, paint with rainbows and many many other skills. It is unfair to wait so long. So, guided by their curious noses, they embark on a path of adventures where they will encounter new, unknown creatures and undertake seemingly impossible journeys. They will discover the meaning of friendship, courage, and the sheer joy of being a rain. What could possibly go wrong, except for some good, sunny weather?
